price: “isheen tun hintaane Du’a teenya kan jalqabaa malee. Nuti (kana booda) kaafamoo miti.
arabic: إِنۡ هِيَ إِلَّا مَوۡتَتُنَا ٱلۡأُولَىٰ وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمُنشَرِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: in hiya illā mawtatunā al-ūlā wamā naḥnu bimunsharīna
